summary: Ida is a woman who was adopted to Finland from Africa as a child. Ida is an unemployed seamstress approaching her thirties and still lives at home with her activist mother Kati. Kati wants ... See full summary »
cast: Amira Khalifa|Marja Packalén|Matti Ristinen|Leena Uotila|Jarkko Niemi|Tomi Salmela|Alf Hemming|Margit Suonperä|Elina Vehkaoja|Sari Viitasalo|Leena Rapola|Liisa Isotalo|Kati Kinnunen|Annaleena Sipilä|Pekka Tuhkanen|Matti Onnismaa|Kari Olamaa|Heini Lehto|Leila Talarmo|Annika Ernst|Ismail Sahin|Leander Lichti|Christiane Zeiske|Melanie Stahl|Tyron Ricketts|Arndt Schwering-Sohnrey|Beate Pfeiffer
title: Maata meren alla
